For general information, please visit the website of the [Marketing Institute (HU Berlin)](https://www.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/de/professuren/bwl/marketing/studium). For students who are writing a seminar paper or thesis at the Marketing Institute, we also offer additional material for self-study ([Introduction to Scientific Work](https://www.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/de/professuren/bwl/marketing/studium/ba-studiengaenge/709002-einfuehrung-in-das-wissenschaftliche-arbeiten-020922-1.pdf)).
